document.masterDocTitle: A list of the fleas (Siphonaptera) of Mexico with new host and distribution records

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A list of the fleas (Siphonaptera) of Mexico with new host and distribution records

subSubSection.paragraph:
Material examined— Distrito Federal:
12 .I. 1932
and
IX. 1932
, S. Ruiz,
9 males
. Hidalgo: Tlanchinol,
Peromyscus furvus J.A. Allen & Chapman, 1997
, B. Salceda,
26 males
,
20 females
; Tenango de Doria,
13 females
.

Remarks—This species usually occurs on murid rodents.
Ponce & Llorente­Bousquets ( 1993 )
reported this flea on several species of
Peromyscus Gloger
, but
P. furvus
is a new host record.

caption.paragraph: TABLE 1. Comprehensive list of the fleas of Mexico by State (Ags=Aguascalientes, BC=Baja California, BCS=Baja California Sur, Cam=Campeche, Chs=Chiapas, Chi=Chihuahua, Coa=Coahuila, Col=Colima, DF=Distrito Federal, Mex=Estado de Mexico, Dgo=Durango, Gto=Guanajuato, Gro=Guerrero, Hgo=Hidalgo, Jal=Jalisco, Mic=Michoacan, Mor=Morelos, Nay=Nayarit, Nln=Nuevo Leon, Oax=Oaxaca, Pue=Puebla, QR=Quintana Roo, Qro=Queretaro, SLP=San Luis Potosi, Sin=Sinaloa, Son=Sonora, Tab=Tabasco, Tam=Tamaulipas, Tlx=Tlaxcala, Ver=Veracruz, Yuc=Yucatán, Zac=Zacatecas).
